events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate who is interested in the software engineer role.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department due to the candidate's software development experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering profiles has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process.
The initial screening call was conducted, and the candidate demonstrated strong foundational knowledge in software engineering concepts.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for proceeding to the next stage of the interview process.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 7th to assess advanced software development skills.
